title: 3-Way Audio Video AV RCA Switch Selector Box Splitter For XBOX XBOX360 DVD PS2 PS3 with AV Cable
description: Description:Connect 3 video devices (such as XBOX DVD PS2) to the "Input1, 2, 3" connectors while your TV to the "Output" connector with the offered RCA cable. Then, at once you want to use one of the three connected Video devices, just pull the switch to the relative "Output 1, 2, 3" rather than discommodiously reconnect the video devices again and again.Convenient to use.Features:3-way AV Audio Video RCA Switch Box Selector Splitter For XBOX DVD PS2 PS3.Allow your TV Set to be connected with 3 video devices, such as XBOX, DVD, PS2.Convenient switch control-just pull the switch point at the relative AV input 1, 2, 3,easy installation and operation.No extra power supply and software drive needed.Light weight, portable size, easy to carry.Comes with one 3to3 male to male M/M RCA cable.Dimension: 6.7" L x 2.6" W x 1.1" H (170 x 67 x 29 mm).Cable Length: 3.2 feet (0.96m).specification:Itme type:3 In 1 Out AV RCA Switch.Interface: 3 groups of RCA input connectors, 1 group RCA output connectors.Cable length: 3.2 feet (0.96m).Dimension: 6.7" L x 2.6" W x 1.1" H (170 x 67 x 29 mm).Weight: 3.0 oz (86 g).Package Included1 x 3-In-1 Out AV RCA Switch Splitter1 x RCA Cable
